text:
Steps:

1. Process the attached source, it contains a table which
   has got background-color set on table-cell elements
2. View the result either in AWT renderer or as PDF

Observed:

Table is rendered incorrectly, with unexpected pixels of backgound-color where there should have been a solid border, see attached jpg.

If we remove background-color out the bug does not manifest itself anymore.
